title: Dodging
body: If in ranked, people dodge the instant the champ they are playing is banned, is there a point to bans existing?

replies.body:
Um, yes. 
If one of your teammates dodges because their champion is banned, it also means that they won't be playing at their best. And it is a good thing as it gives you a higher chance of winning if they play that specific champion, although they may dodge just because they want to try a champion in ranked and it's banned.

On the other hand, banning is good because:
-YOU DON'T WANT OP CHAMPIONS ON THE ENEMY TEAM
-It stops the enemy team playing at their best if one of their mains are banned
-Your teammates banning champions that counter their own champions can be beneficial for winning and so on.

Or else, just deal with it lel.
Uh yes, if my one trick champ is banned, i'd dodge since it's the only champion i know i'd win despite 4 douchebag teammates inting or not.
